member.name: WS_SERVICE_METADATA
member.summary: Specifies the service metadata documents array. This can be a collection of WSDL/XSD documents represented as an array of WS_STRING.

member.name: WS_SERVICE_METADATA.documentCount
member.summary: The count of metadata documents being specified.

member.name: WS_SERVICE_METADATA.documents
member.summary: A * array where element represents a WS_SERVICE_METADATA_DOCUMENT for each individual XML Schema, WSDL or a Policy document. The service model expects this to be valid for the lifetime of the WS_SERVICE_HOST.

member.name: WS_SERVICE_METADATA.serviceName
member.summary: Reference to WS_XML_STRING representing the name of the service in the WSDL document. Note that this field must be specified along with the serviceNs field. The service model expects this to be valid for the lifetime of the WS_SERVICE_HOST.

member.name: WS_SERVICE_METADATA.serviceNs
member.summary: Reference to WS_XML_STRING representing the namespace of the service in the WSDL document. Note that this field must be specified along with the serviceName field. The service model expects this to be valid for the lifetime of the WS_SERVICE_HOST.
